thread.title: Kenya: Lower Kabete,University of Nairobi students to demonstrate in solidarity with their striking lecturers
thread.title_full: Kenya: Lower Kabete,University of Nairobi students to demonstrate in solidarity with their striking lecturers

title: Kenya: Lower Kabete,University of Nairobi students to demonstrate in solidarity with their striking lecturers
text:
Kenya Lower Kabete,University of Nairobi students to demonstrate in solidarity with their striking lecturers By Mercy Asamba  31   Lower Kabete,University of Nairobi. (Photo: Courtesy) 
Lower Kabete,University of Nairobi students stage demonstrations in solidarity with their striking lecturers. The students have appealed to the Government to look into dons grievances. 
The students have claimed they are in dire need of education and want the government to act so that the lecturers can come back to class. 
They have given a 12-hour notice after which they will commence their strike day and night. 
“The country is reach and the government is spending money on other things instead of paying the professors and doctors their dues,” said one of the students. 
They intend to hold peaceful demonstrations unless they are pushed to the corner.
